overview: 𝘒𝘶𝘯𝘨 𝘦𝘥𝘶𝘬𝘢𝘴𝘺𝘰𝘯 𝘢𝘯𝘨 𝘴𝘢𝘣𝘢𝘵 𝘱𝘢𝘳𝘢 𝘮𝘢𝘬𝘢𝘱𝘢𝘭𝘢𝘨𝘺𝘰 𝘴𝘢 𝘱𝘢𝘨𝘱𝘢𝘮𝘪𝘨𝘰𝘴 𝘴𝘢𝘯𝘨 𝘬𝘢𝘱𝘪𝘨𝘢𝘥𝘶𝘩𝘰𝘯, 𝘢𝘯𝘨 𝘪𝘴𝘢 𝘬𝘢 𝘢𝘥𝘭𝘢𝘸 𝘯𝘨𝘢 𝘸𝘢𝘭𝘢 𝘴𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘯𝘢𝘵𝘶𝘯-𝘢𝘯 𝘢𝘯𝘨 𝘣𝘢𝘵𝘢, 𝘪𝘴𝘢 𝘮𝘢𝘯 𝘬𝘢 𝘰𝘱𝘰𝘳𝘵𝘶𝘯𝘪𝘥𝘢𝘥 𝘯𝘨𝘢 𝘯𝘢𝘶𝘺𝘢𝘯𝘨.  A documentary film about the realities faced by grade school pupils in public schools as a result of the pandemic; their experiences and insights will show us how they dealt with their situation in overcoming adversity.  Is the sudden shift to the new learning modality for a greater cause? or will it hamper the learning capacity of students?
tagline: Through the lens of the children: education in the middle of a pandemic
title: Just A Module
